author: vmassol
msg: Removed unneeded properties. The default values are already defined in the build.xml file.

author: vmassol
msg: Added new optional nested <containerclasspath> element for the <cactus> task. It allows specifying additional jars that will be put in the classpath used to start/stop the specified containers.

author: vmassol
msg: After several hours of debugging... finally found why the clover reports were missing the Ant integration source code... I have not yet fully tested the code but it works with Resin. Hope it works with other containers too.

author: vmassol
msg: Fix problem for running EAR when using cactus:test (using the cactus.is.ear property)
